page.title: 13BREAN VILLAGE
page.content: VISITING THE VILLAGE OF BREAN ON A SUNNY DAY IN MID-SUMMER,AS WE DID FOR THIS PROJECT,WE FOUND THAT DRIVING ALONG THE ROAD WAS HAZARDOUS.THIS WAS PARTLY DUE TO THE NARROWNESS OF THE ROAD,BUT DUE TO THE MANY CARS AND PEOPLE IN SCANT SUMMER DRESS.THE SUMMER POPULATION,OF THIS TINY RESORT,IS ABOUT TWO HUNDRED TIMES THE WINTER POPULATION OF SOME ONE HUNDRED PEOPLE. THE CHURCH OF SAINT BRIDGET HAS BEEN RECENTLY REFURBISHED AND ITS INTERIOR IS PLEASING FOR THOSE WHO WORSHIP OR VISIT THERE.THERE HAS BEEN A CHURCH ON THE SITE FOR AT LEAST SEVEN HUNDRED YEARS.THE METHODIST CHURCH IS MUCH MORE RECENT BUT IS EQUALLY INVITING. IN WINTER BREAN SLEEPS.IN SUMMER IT IS ALIVE AND BUSY.
